_header: O excellent sovereign most seemly to see
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; love lyrics
_description: The Beauty of his Mistress, a ‘symple letter’ — six 12-line stanzas (ababbccdeeed)

BodRawC813.First Lines:
O excelent Suffereigne most semely to Seebothe prudent and pure
                    lyke a perle of prise…
BodRawC813.Last Lines: …my harte ye haue to kepeby god that made thys day
